0871A46B.Toast: The Iron Wolves' water supply has been poisoned.

3FC40BBF.Callback27Header: Speak with Asa at the oasis' shore

538236DE.Callback17Header: Enter the Tunnels Beneath the Oasis

B87761DE.Phase18Description: Asa and I chased a bandit into caverns beneath the oasis. We must put a stop to whatever it is they are doing here.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: Something is polluting the Iron Wolves' water supplies. Haddad asked that I meet up with Asa to determine the cause.
